rows.label: qst102201_msg0001
rows.name:
That Gulan guy Nis who
joined up recently...

rows.label: qst102201_msg0002
rows.name:
I think he might have
killed my mum and dad.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0003
rows.name: Back when I was only little...

rows.label: qst102201_msg0004
rows.name:
My parents left me in Torigo while
they went on a mission with a group
of mercenaries, including him.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0005
rows.name:
But all that came back was
their Blades' Core Crystals.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0006
rows.name:
The lady at the inn where I was
staying looked into it for me...

rows.label: qst102201_msg0007
rows.name:
Turns out that guy came back
from the mission alone, and
then went off somewhere.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0008
rows.name:
Rumor had it that he'd betrayed his
allies and taken the reward, or left
them to the monsters to save himself...

rows.label: qst102201_msg0009
rows.name:
Whichever's the truth, he's a
coward who left my parents to die.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0010
rows.name:
I tried to warn Yuu that
he was dangerous...

rows.label: qst102201_msg0011
rows.name:
But he wouldn't take me
seriously. He doesn't think
Nis seems like a bad guy.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0012
rows.name:
I want you to help me find
proof that Nis was the one
who betrayed my mum and dad.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0013
rows.name:
Really, I wanna face him with my dad's
Blade and avenge them right now... But
I can't do that here in the village.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0014
rows.name:
I want to make him apologize
for taking my parents from me.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0015
rows.name:
I'm sorry to ask such a
nasty task of you...

rows.label: qst102201_msg0016
rows.name: You'll find Nis in the training ground.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0101
rows.name: Mum, Dad... I'll avenge you.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0201
rows.name: How did it go?

rows.label: qst102201_msg0202
rows.name:
You're still not sure...?
Huh? A mission?

rows.label: qst102201_msg0203
rows.name:
That's the perfect chance! While
you're on the mission, you can
get the truth out of him!

rows.label: qst102201_msg0301
rows.name:
Talk to Nis while you're on that
mission, and find out what really
happened to my mum and dad!
